content: children s dk fingerless gloves materials 2 x 4mm circulars dk yarn 3 stitch markers abbreviations dk double knitting st s stitch es k knit p purl m1 make a stitch by knitting into the back of the bar between the sts sm slip marker method cast on 32 stitches - 16 on each needle work 10 row k1 p1 rib work 10 row stocking stitch start thumb k to last 2 sts place marker m1 k1 m1 place marker k last st k 2 more rounds k to marker sm m1 k1 m1 sm k last st increase in this way to 9 thumb sts work 2 row straight k to marker increasing in the last st leave the 9 thumb sts on a piece of yarn removing markers continue knitting the last st and the rest of the round 16 sts on each needle work 7 more rounds in stocking stitch work 3 rounds in rib cast off loosely thumb knit the 9 thumb sts and pick up 3 sts from the gap at top of thumb 12sts work 1 more round in knit and then 3 rounds in rib cast off loosely making up sew in ends carefully
